questionsData.title: Wasp sting can be treated by using vinegar.
Solid can't be changed easily because its shape is fixed.

Sound travels as particles.
Breakthrough is a sudden discovery.

questionsData.explain_answer: To turn down advice is to not accept it.

questionsData.title: Tightropes walker is somebody who tames lions.
Dates are sour in taste.
People always prepare the ingredients after finishing cooking.
Stern is the back of the ship.
Mystery means something that can be explained.
The text is mainly talking about…….
questionsData.article: The shape of earth is always changing. These changes have many (different 2) causes. Some come from forces below ground. These forces can cause a volcano, an earthquake, or a tsunami. And afterwards, the land will look very different. Changes also happen because of the weather. Many years of rain, for example, can wash away dirt and change the shape of rocks. In the desert, the wind blows the sand and changes the shape of hills. Water can also change the shape of the land. For example, a river can make a deep cut into a mountain. At the (seaside 1), waves can move the shore inland. New technology has helped scientists learn more about the earth. For example, they now understand what a volcano is. (They 3) also know what kinds of rocks and chemicals usually come out of a volcano. Scientists have also learned a lot about earthquakes. However, there are still some important things that scientists don’t know about the earth. For example, they can’t say when a volcano or an earthquake will happen. Eventually, we are sure that scientists will keep on studying and researching till they get the answers for all the unknown natural events.

questionsData.title: I want to make tea. Can you give me …….. sugar?
The compound word is………
questionsData.explain_answer:
A compound word is a word that is formed by combining two or more separate words. When these words are joined together, they create a new word with a distinct meaning. The combination of the individual words may result in a word that represents a concept, object, or idea that is different from the meanings of the individual words on their own.

Compound words can be formed in different ways, including:

Closed compound words: These are compound words that are written as a single word without any spaces or hyphens between the constituent words. For example, "firefighter," "bookseller," "dressmaker," and "newsreader."

Hyphenated compound words: These are compound words that are connected with a hyphen (-) between the constituent words. For example "taxi-driver".

Open compound words: These are compound words that are written as separate words without any hyphens or spaces. For example, "tourist guide, computer programmer,  film director, science teacher, bank manager, and project manager".

Schools will …….to teach in spite of the war.
We look forward to…… our friends.
If Ahmed works hard, he will . . . .high marks.
Some letters are being …….by the secretary.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Some letters are being typed by the secretary,

 it means that the secretary is currently in the process of typing the letters. The word "typed" is the past participle form of the verb "type," which is used to describe an action that has already been completed.but In this case, the letters have not yet been fully typed, but they are currently undergoing the process of being typed by the secretary.

  • "types" is the present tense form of the verb "type." However, in this sentence, we are referring to an action that is currently happening
  • typing" is the present participle form of the verb "type. "typing" is not the appropriate choice.
  • "type" is the base form of the verb, but in this sentence,
